name: Tapo Dots
description:
Do you have an urge to aimlessly tap your screen for unredeemable, yet brag-able, points? Then Tapo Dots is the perfect game for you!

So loosen up those thumbs and prepare for a tappy blast … or just watch as you tap little white balls down a dark infinite hole of no return. Either way fun for everyone!

Music By Josh Arduini
